title: privacy settings
extract: Choose your privacy settingsOn your computer, open Chrome.At the top right, click More Settings.At the bottom, click Advanced.Under "Privacy and security," choose what settings to turn off. To control how Chrome handles content and permissions for a site, click Content settings.
extract_html:
Choose your privacy settings
  • On your computer, open Chrome.
  • At the top right, click More Settings.
  • At the bottom, click Advanced.
  • Under "Privacy and security," choose what settings to turn off. To control how Chrome handles content and permissions for a site, click Content settings.
